metadata.title: CVE-2024-42124 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: qedf: Make qedf_execute_tmf() non-preemptibleStop calling smp_processor_id() from preemptible code inqedf_execute_tmf90.  This results in BUG_ON() when running an RT kernel.[ 659.343280] BUG: using smp_processor_id() in preemptible [00000000] code:sg_reset/3646[ 659.343282] caller is qedf_execute_tmf+0x8b/0x360 [qedf]

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

linux-gcp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
